sentence:
In light of these results, the potential impact of the microbiome on therapeutic interventions for brain tumor should be considered.Concluding Remarks
In this review we have summarized how inflammation and immune suppression along with the microbiome can lead to the induction and sustaining of brain tumors (Figure 1).
Accordingly, we propose that certain gut microbiota in concert with the host’s background may affect the body’s immune system and metabolism through a gear model leading to cancer (Figure 2).
These interactions (or gears), in turn, may result in altered and specifically suppressed immune function, allowing some cells to escape immune surveillance (Figure 2).
Our proposed gear model (Figure 2) has direct implications for tumor etiology and, accordingly, cancer therapy.
Red arrows in the right panel highlight tumor-promoting pathways, while green arrows indicate tumor-inhibitory pathways.Figure 2.

In light of these results, the potential impact of the microbiome on therapeutic interventions for brain tumor should be considered.Concluding Remarks
